title: Small Business
name: startbootstrap-small-business
description: A small business HTML template built with Bootstrap
author: Start Bootstrap

scripts.vendor: mkdir -p vendor/bootstrap/css vendor/bootstrap/js vendor/jquery && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css vendor/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js vendor/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js vendor/jquery/jquery.min.js
